text: Plants have multiple different properties, one of them is the damage Effect.
$(br2)Effects are diverse, doing continuous damage, slowing down Zombies, dealing more damage to specific types, etc.
$(br2)Here's a list of all of the different effects:
$(br2)Chill slows down Zombies, giving plants more time to finish them off.
$(br2)Moves based on animation like Gargantuar's smash are slowed down by half.
$(br2)Frozen completely stops Zombies in their tracks.
$(br2)Frozen instantly kills zombies that swim and flying Zombies.
$(br)Sets Zombies on fire, unless they are wet. Wet Zombies prevent Fire Splash, halving direct damage as well.
$(br)Zombies on fire take 1 DMG/sec if they are not being attacked.
$(br2)Zombies get Warm, which prevents Chill from being applied.
$(br2)Wet Zombies, extinguishing and preventing Fire for a short time.
$(br2)Deals double the damage against Paper and Stone.
$(br)Chains damage between Zombies based on initial damage unless specified otherwise. Chain's range is by the Electric Radius, that is based on the location of the hit Zombie.
$(br)Electricity chains by the number of Electric Chains. Metallic doesn't count towards the number. Plastic/Rubber cost 2 Electric Chains when hit.
$(br)Electric damage doubles if the target is Wet.
$(br2)Stun completely stops Zombies in their tracks for 0.5 seconds.
$(br2)Deals continuous direct damage to the zombie, ignoring armor.
$(br2)Can only be applied to Zombies with Flesh (default type).
$(br2)Transforms the Zombie into a Hypnotized version of itself.
$(br2)Most of the time they have their abilities, save a few exceptions.
